DOC.brief_summary: The investigator conduct n=5,400 Phase 3 , double-blind , individually randomise placebo-controlled clinical trial 5 year ' duration primary school City Cape Town Metropolitan Municipality , Western Cape Province , Republic South Africa . The primary objective trial determine whether weekly oral dose 0.25 mg ( 10,000 IU ) vitamin D3 , administer three year , reduces risk acquisition latent tuberculosis infection ( LTBI ) Cape Town primary schoolchildren . Statistical analysis perform intention-to-treat basis compare acquisition LTBI intervention vs. control arm three-year follow-up . The primary analysis logistic regression presence/absence LTBI follow-up outcome , adjust random effect school attendance .
